mapper.insert: insert into board(num,writer,title,content,reg_date, boardnum,files,tablenum) values( board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, #{files}, 77 )
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select NVL(max(num),0) from board where tablenum=77
select count(*) from board where tablenum=77
select * from files where boardnum=#{boardnum} and tablenum=77
